commands.name: az devcenter admin devbox-definition create
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin devbox-definition create --dev-center
                                            --devbox-definition-name
                                            --image-reference
                                            --os-storage-type
                                            --resource-group
                                            --sku
                                            [--hibernate-support {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                            [--location]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--tags]
examples: az devcenter admin devbox-definition create --location "eastus" --image-reference id="/subscriptions/0ac520ee-14c0-480f-b6c9-0a90c58ffff/resourceGroups/Example/providers/Microsoft.DevCenter/devcenters/Contoso/galleries/contosogallery/images/exampleImage/version/1.0.0" --os-storage-type "ssd_1024gb" --sku name="general_a_8c32gb_v1" --name "WebDevBox" --dev-center-name "Contoso" --resource-group "rg1"

commands.name: az devcenter admin devbox-definition delete
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin devbox-definition delete [--dev-center]
                                            [--devbox-definition-name]
                                            [--ids]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--subscription]
                                            [--yes]

commands.name: az devcenter admin devbox-definition list
commands.summary: List dev box definitions configured for a dev center or project.

commands.name: az devcenter admin devbox-definition show
commands.summary: Get a dev box definition configured for a dev center or a project.

commands.name: az devcenter admin devbox-definition update
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin devbox-definition update [--add]
                                            [--dev-center]
                                            [--devbox-definition-name]
                                            [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--hibernate-support {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                            [--ids]
                                            [--image-reference]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--os-storage-type]
                                            [--remove]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--set]
                                            [--sku]
                                            [--subscription]
                                            [--tags]

commands.name: az devcenter admin devbox-definition wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
